whatWeDoTools.name: InSpec
whatWeDoTools.desc: InSpec is a free and open-source Chef framework for system security testing, designed to integrate easily into existing DevOps pipelines.
whatWeDoTools.summary: InSpec generates the security data an organization needs to assess itself.

whatWeDoTools.name: Heimdall
whatWeDoTools.desc: Heimdall is a web-based security test results viewer, designed to work with the data InSpec generates. Heimdall takes mountains of testing data and displays it in a convenient, intuitive web page.
whatWeDoTools.summary: Heimdall allows the organization to analyze its security data and make meaningful decisions from it.
